# r-alert



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                 | Type                                          | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alertTitle`  | `alert-title` | Alert title                 | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
| `center`      | `center`      | Whether to center content   | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `closable`    | `closable`    | Whether alert can be closed | `boolean`                                     | `true`      |
| `closeText`   | `close-text`  | Custom close text           | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
| `description` | `description` | Alert description           | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
| `effect`      | `effect`      | Alert effect/theme          | `"dark" \| "light"`                           | `'light'`   |
| `showIcon`    | `show-icon`   | Whether to show icon        | `boolean`                                     | `true`      |
| `type`        | `type`        | Alert type                  | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'info'`    |


## Events

| Event   | Description | Type                |
| ------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `close` |             | `CustomEvent<void>` |
